recipesJson.name: Typical fruit loops in milk
recipesJson.author: Jbirdy34
recipesJson.description: Tastes just like fruit loops in milk to me. Credit to steam for the milk base he has on here took some of that and implemented it in tastes good as of a day later. But it's a fruit loops cereal there are a bunch of them all just a little different. Enjoy if you mix it up.
